name: Get off my Seaweed-Lawn BLUE Edition
name_original: Get off my Seaweed-Lawn BLUE Edition
description:
Get off my Seaweed-Lawn BLUE Edition  is a version of the game idea "Get off my Seaweed-Lawn", which was made within a university project of the SRH Hochschule-Heidelberg

Get off my Seaweed-Lawn is a Space Invaders-like Game.

Gameplay:

Fight increasingly powerful waves of Neptune's minions, while collecting the currency "Seaweed" to buy upgrades or new weapons. Fight your way to wave 10 to battle Neptune himself. Then play in endless mode to get the best weapon with the best upgrades!

Story:

When Neptune brought the city of Atlantis to the bottom of the sea, it destroyed the seaweed plantation of Algamus Hanfe. Thereby the whole Seaweed of Algamus Hanfe was destroyed! He longs for revenge and wants to hunt down Neptune with his own hands!

Also try the BOSS Edition of the Game by Robin Günther:

https://endergeist.itch.io/get-off-my-seaweed-lawn-boss-edition
